vote.text: Amendment SA 4106 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4106 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S7629-7630; text: CR S7629-7630) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4106 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Menendez.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4106 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
